translation.en: Puppet, sir? Only 10 piastres .
They're crap. They fall apart before you're out the door.
translation.fr: C'est de la camelote.Trois bouts de ficelles collés ensemble.

translation.en: Five then, sir. It's handmade!
translation.fr: Cinq, alors. Fabriquées à la main !

translation.en: Please? My sister. She's very, very sick.
translation.fr: S'il vous plaît. Ma sœur est très malade.

translation.en: I know your sister. She's peddling in the next bar over.
translation.fr: Je connais ta sœur.Elle fait comme toi dans le bar d'à côté.

translation.en: Do you know my mother?
Nope. She's very, very sick.
I'll give you two.
That's a bad idea, you know.
translation.fr: Il ne faut pas faire ça.

translation.en: Like feeding pigeons.
Do I know you? My name is Semelier.
translation.fr: - On se connaît ?- Je suis Semelier.

translation.en: I work for a private collector of rare antiquities. I cabled you last week.
translation.fr: Je travaille pour un collectionneur.Je vous ai envoyé un télégramme.

translation.en: And I didn't answer.
There's been a discovery in East Africa.
translation.fr: Il y a une découverteen Afrique de l'Est.

translation.en: A Christian church, circa 5 A.D.
translation.fr: Il y a une découverteen Afrique de l'Est. Une église chrétienne, an 5 environ.

translation.en: No, that's not possible.
The Byzantine Empire had adopted Christianity at that time, but they never got that far south.
translation.fr: L'Empire byzantin était devenu chrétien,mais ils n'ont pas gagné cette région.

translation.en: Nevertheless, there it sits.
translation.fr: Et pourtant, elle est bien là.

translation.en: The British have financed a dig to uncover this church.
We believe a rare object waits inside.
We'd like you to find it and bring it back to us.
So you think I'm a thief?
translation.fr: Vous me prenez pour un voleur ?

translation.en: Now you think I'm a thief and a whore.
translation.fr: Pour un voleur doublé d'une putain.

translation.en: simply a man who's lost faith in everything except himself.
translation.fr: Pour un homme qui ne croit plus à riensauf en lui-même.

translation.en: You know nothing about me.
An Oxford-educated archeologist, an expert in religious icons.
translation.fr: Archéologue sorti d'Oxford,spécialiste en icônes religieuses.

translation.en: You were a priest before the war. So, what happened?
translation.fr: Et prêtre avant la guerre.Que s'est-il passé ?

translation.en: This is a leather impression of the artifact we're looking for.
translation.fr: C'est une réplique de l'objetque nous cherchons.

translation.en: A representation of a mythical demon.
It's Sumerian.
What makes you think it's in a church in Africa?
Major Granville in Nairobi is in charge of the dig.
translation.fr: Le major Granville dirige les fouilles.

translation.en: He's been persuaded to let you join it.
translation.fr: On l'a persuadé de vous accueillir.

translation.en: You're assuming that I will say yes.
translation.fr: Vous présumez que je vais accepter.

translation.en: You already have.
MAN: March!
Left, left, right, left. Left....
translation.fr: Q.G. DE L'ARMÉE BRITANNIQUENAIROBI, KENYA Gauche, gauche.Gauche, droite, gauche.

translation.en: Left. Left, right, left. Left...
Mr. Merrin, sir. The major will see you now.
translation.fr: M. Merrin ? Le major vous reçoit.

translation.en: GRANVILLE: Beautiful, aren't they?
It's a hobby from school days. Works wonders for the nerves.
translation.fr: Un passe-temps de jeunesse.Ça détend beaucoup.

translation.en: You should try it sometime.
What can you tell me about the dig?
The location is a remote area of the Turkana district called Derati.
translation.fr: Elles se déroulent à Derati,un coin isolé du district de Turkana.

translation.en: It was discovered several months ago by a detachment of my men on maneuvers there.
translation.fr: Le site a été découvertpar un détachement, lors de manœuvres.

translation.en: When the powers that be realized its importance, they organized a dig.
translation.fr: Ma hiérarchie a compris son importanceet lancé le chantier.

translation.en: So, what have they learned so far?
That it's a church where no church should be.
translation.fr: Que cette église n'avait rien à faire là.

translation.en: This is Father Francis.
He'll be accompanying you to Derati.
It's a pleasure to finally meet you, Father Merrin.
translation.fr: Ravi de vous rencontrer, Père Merrin.

translation.en: I've read all your work at seminary. It's Mr. Merrin.
translation.fr: - Au séminaire, je vous ai beaucoup lu.- C'est M. Merrin.

translation.en: I was especially impressed with your treatise on the Roman rituals.
translation.fr: Votre traité sur la liturgie romainem'a marqué.

translation.en: I'm no longer a part of that.
But I'm sure you didn't come here to discuss Catholic rituals.
translation.fr: Vous ne venez sûrement pasdiscuter des rites catholiques.

translation.en: No, I was actually headed to Kenya to begin missionary work
when Rome learned of the discovery.
translation.fr: quand Rome a apprispour les découvertes.

translation.en: They asked me to make sure the site's religious aspect have the proper consideration.
translation.fr: On m'a demandé de veiller au respectdu caractère religieux du lieu.

translation.en: How come you've opened the site to the Vatican?
translation.fr: Vous avez ouvert le site au Vatican ?

translation.en: We haven't...
officially.
You're both my guests.
Tell me, have you any theories on who might have built this church?
translation.fr: Des théoriessur les bâtisseurs de cette église ?

translation.en: Well, not until I've seen it.
Surely the Vatican has some record of its creation?
translation.fr: Le Vatican doit avoirune trace de sa fondation.

translation.en: No, I'm afraid not.
We're as in the dark about it as you are.
translation.fr: Nous n'en savons pas plus que vous.

translation.en: How long have you been with the dig, Chuma?
Since the beginning. The British hired me as an interpreter.
translation.fr: Depuis le début. Les Anglaism'ont engagé comme interprète.

translation.en: What happened here?
Plague. Ravaged the valley 50 years ago.
translation.fr: La peste.Elle a ravagé la vallée il y a 50 ans.

translation.en: How many died?
All of them.
I'm Lankester Merrin.
Major Granville should've contacted you about my joining the dig.
translation.fr: Granville a dû vous prévenirde mon arrivée.

translation.en: He did.
Is something bothering you, mate?
translation.fr: Il y a un problème, l'ami ?

translation.en: No. I'd like to see the dig site as soon as possible.
translation.fr: J'aimerais voir le site au plus vite.

translation.en: Do you drink, Merrin? I shouldn't.
translation.fr: - Vous buvez, Merrin ?- Je ne devrais pas.

translation.en: But my will is weak.
Then you might just survive this place.
translation.fr: Vous survivrez peut-être, dans ce cas.

translation.en: I understand you've uncovered the church dome, but that progress has slowed down.
translation.fr: Ça n'avance plusdepuis la découverte du dôme ?

translation.en: You could say that. Right, doctor?
translation.fr: On peut dire ça. Non, docteur ?

translation.en: I'm Sarah Novak. Very nice to meet you. Lankester-- Lankester Merrin.
You still haven't made it by my room, doctor.
translation.fr: Vous n'êtes pas passée par ma chambre.

translation.en: I've been having this swelling...
in the evening. Thought you might have something I could put on it.
translation.fr: le soir.Vous auriez un truc à mettre dessus ?

translation.en: How about a muzzle?
So how are the interior excavations coming on?
They're not. No?
Has the structure collapsed?
No, the church is perfect, but none of the men will enter.
translation.fr: Non. L'église est intacte,mais les gars refusent d'entrer.

translation.en: Those we have left, anyway. Why is that?
translation.fr: - Ceux qui sont restés, en tout cas.- Pourquoi ?

translation.en: I shall be leaving for the dig in five minutes.
translation.fr: Je pars sur place dans cinq minutes.

translation.en: Pleasant fellow.
What's wrong with his face?
translation.fr: Quel est le souci avec son visage ?

translation.en: Other than that it's attached to his body?
translation.fr: À part le faitqu'il est attaché à son corps ?

translation.en: Could be an allergic reaction or some kind of localized infection.
translation.fr: Peut-être une allergieou une infection locale.

translation.en: Do you know why the men won't enter the church?
translation.fr: Pourquoi les hommes refusent d'entrerdans l'église ?

translation.en: Evil spirits... Oh.
translation.fr: Il y a des mauvais esprits.

translation.en: if you believe the Turkana.
And do you?
No. I'm a doctor.
As a priest, surely you must believe in such things.
translation.fr: En tant que prêtre, vous y croyez.

translation.en: I'm an archeologist. I'm not a priest. Now, that's funny.
translation.fr: - Je suis archéologue, pas prêtre.- C'est drôle.

translation.en: I met Father Francis outside, and he told me you were.
translation.fr: Le père Francis m'a ditque vous en étiez un.

translation.en: Did he? Well, he is mistaken.
FRANCIS: Father Merrin.
This is Emekwi.
He's donating the use of a room in his hotel for the mission school.
translation.fr: Il autorise l'école missionnaireà utiliser son hôtel.

translation.en: Father, we are so glad that you are here.
translation.fr: Mon père, quelle joie de vous voir !

translation.en: These are my sons, James and Joseph.
Hello, James. Joseph. They are learning the Bible.
translation.fr: - Bonjour, James. Joseph.- Ils apprennent la Bible.

translation.en: We are Christians, you know.
Emekwi, can you see to Mr. Merrin's bags?
translation.fr: Emekwi, vous vous occupez de ses sacs ?

translation.en: Of course. James, Joseph?
Very nice meeting you, doctor.
There's your goddamn church.
MERRIN: Is this your first assignment, Father?
translation.fr: C'est votre première mission, mon père ?

translation.en: FRANCIS: Uh well, before this, I was studying in the archives in the Holy See.
The Vatican. Impressive. But not really training for missionary work, is it?
translation.fr: Au Vatican ? Impressionnant.Surtout pour un futur missionnaire.

translation.en: This is strange.
It's 1500 years old.
It should be badly weathered.
translation.fr: Elle devrait être usée par le temps.

translation.en: It's almost as if it were buried right after it was built.
translation.fr: On dirait qu'elle a été enfouieaprès la construction.

translation.en: Where's Jefferies? I need to go into the church.
translation.fr: Où est Jefferies ? Je dois entrer.

translation.en: Hyenas.
They've been here ever since we started digging.
translation.fr: Elles sont là depuis le début.

translation.en: Even at daytime?
What's the matter with him? I don't know.
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce qui lui arrive ?- Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: The heat?
Are you out here by yourself? It's dangerous.
translation.fr: Tu es tout seul ? C'est dangereux.

translation.en: I'm collecting rocks. I can see that.
translation.fr: - Je ramasse des cailloux.- Je vois, oui.

translation.en: I think you're about ready for this now.
translation.fr: Je crois que tu es prêt pour autre chose.

translation.en: It's a tool for professional diggers.
His seizure stopped. I wanted to keep him at the hospital for observation,
translation.fr: Sa crise est finie.Je voulais le garder en observation,

translation.en: but Turkana have stopped trusting my medicine.
translation.fr: mais les Turkanane me font plus confiance.

translation.en: Well, that must make your job very hard.
translation.fr: Ça doit vous compliquer la tâche.

translation.en: You have no idea.
Thank you.
What is it you hope to find here?
The answer to why a church was built here
a thousand years before Christianity arrived.
translation.fr: bâtie mille ans avant l'arrivéedu christianisme.

translation.en: You were a priest once, weren't you?
translation.fr: Vous avez été prêtre, n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: Yes, I was.
Bloody savages!
Can't wipe their own ass without instruction.
translation.fr: À peine capables de se torcher.

translation.en: I have to get back to town. Wait. I found this.
translation.fr: - Je retourne en ville.- Attendez. J'ai trouvé ça.

translation.en: And I want you to have it.
It's a St. Joseph, for luck.
Please. For my behavior.
translation.fr: S'il vous plaît. Pour me racheter.

translation.en: Thank you.
What the hell are you doing?
Get the fuck out of here, you little scab! Don't!
Joseph, wait. Don't do that.
translation.fr: - Joseph, attends.- Ne faites pas ça.

translation.en: All right, Merrin. I didn't know you was a fuzzy lover.
translation.fr: J'ignorais que vous étiezprotecteur des non-Blancs.

translation.en: SARAH: It's okay. Come.
These little buggers get in everywhere.
translation.fr: Ils fouillent partout, ces petits salauds.

translation.en: How soon can you have the doors to the church uncovered?
translation.fr: Quand les portes de l'égliseseront-elles dégagées ?

translation.en: A few days. And in the meantime, how do we get in?
translation.fr: - Dans quelques jours.- En attendant, comment entre-t-on ?

translation.en: "We" don't. Chuma will take you in through the roof.
translation.fr: Pas "on".Chuma peut vous faire passer par le toit.

translation.en: Following us, Father?
Is it safe to walk around?
Let's see.
Lucifer. The Lord's favorite angel.
MERRIN: Cast out after the war in heaven.
translation.fr: Chassé du paradis après la guerre.

translation.en: Can't even trust angels, can you?
translation.fr: Il faut se méfier même des anges.

translation.en: You ever seen anything like it? Not this far from Rome.
translation.fr: - Vous avez déjà vu ça ?- Pas si loin de Rome.

translation.en: It's odd.
Churches were built to exalt heaven, but this...
translation.fr: Les églises servent à exalter le paradis.Mais ici…

translation.en: The weapons are pointing downward.
translation.fr: les armes sont vers le bas.

translation.en: Look behind you, Father.
Desecration of Christ.
Who would do something like this?
translation.fr: Qui a pu faire une chose pareille ?

translation.en: The crucifix was broken off from here.
translation.fr: Le crucifix a été cassé ici.

translation.en: Chuma, is there an inventory of what's been found here?
translation.fr: Chuma, y a-t-il euun inventaire des reliques ?

translation.en: I wouldn't know. MERRIN: Who would know?
translation.fr: - Je ne sais pas.- Qui saurait ?

translation.en: Because this place has been vandalized.
Probably the lead archeologist, Monsieur Bession.
So where can I find him?
I need to talk to him.
It's not possible. Why not?
He's gone mad.
No one's been inside Bession's tent since he fell ill?
translation.fr: Personne n'est entrédans sa tente depuis ?

translation.en: They are superstitious.
And you? Not superstitious. Smart.
Where's Bession now? A sanatorium in Nairobi.
translation.fr: - Où est Bession ?- Dans un sanatorium de Nairobi.

translation.en: How long has he been gone?
A few weeks.
And he can read and write Aramaic? Sorry?
translation.fr: - Il sait lire et écrire l'araméen ?- Quoi ?

translation.en: The language spoken in Palestine
at the time of Christ. And what does it say?
translation.fr: - au temps du Christ.- Ça dit quoi ?

translation.en: "The fallen shall rise in a river of blood."
translation.fr: "Le déchu renaîtradans un fleuve de sang."

translation.en: Do you have a moment? Of course.
translation.fr: - Vous avez une minute ?- Bien sûr.

translation.en: Can I get you some tea?
Or maybe something more substantial?
translation.fr: Ou quelque chose de plus fort ?

translation.en: Yes, that would be very nice.
You dabble in the occult?
I found them here when I arrived.
translation.fr: J'ai trouvé tout ça en arrivant.

translation.en: I wanted to ask you, did you treat Bession?
translation.fr: Est-ce que vous avez traité Bession ?

translation.en: You should let me clean that before it gets infected.
There was nothing I could do for Monsieur Bession.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien pu faire pour Bession.

translation.en: He had no medical symptoms.
Nothing to suggest any kind of disease or infection.
translation.fr: Rien n'indiquant une maladieou une infection.

translation.en: His breakdown was purely mental. And extremely severe.
translation.fr: Son mal était purement mentalet extrêmement grave.

translation.en: That's why the Turkana fear the church is cursed.
That and the disappearances.
translation.fr: Il y a aussi les disparitions.

translation.en: In the past few weeks, we've lost a dozen men.
Runaways?
Or is it those evil spirits?
I'm sorry. I shouldn't have... Your curiosity's perfectly natural.
translation.fr: - Pardon, je n'aurais pas dû.- Je comprends votre curiosité.

translation.en: My father was a strong man.
When the Nazis started rounding up the Jews in our town, he didn't hesitate.
translation.fr: Quand les nazis sont venus en villepour une rafle, il n'a pas hésité.

translation.en: He hid our neighbors in the crawl space.
translation.fr: Il a caché nos voisins juifs.

translation.en: But someone turned us in, and we were all sent to the concentration camps.
translation.fr: On nous a dénoncés et on a tous finien camp de concentration.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
People can't really understand, can they?
translation.fr: Les gens ne peuvent pas comprendre.

translation.en: If they weren't there.
If they didn't see.
My husband turned out to be one of those people.
translation.fr: Mon mari était de ces gens-là.

translation.en: I met him after the war, and we came to Africa together, in love.
translation.fr: Je l'ai connu après la guerre.On est venus en Afrique ensemble.

translation.en: One night I realized I-- I had to tell him the truth...
translation.fr: Un soir, j'ai comprisque je devais lui dire la vérité

translation.en: ...about the Nazis and what they did to me.
translation.fr: sur ce que les nazis m'avaient fait.

translation.en: After that, he never touched me again.
translation.fr: Après ça, il ne m'a plus jamais touchée.

translation.en: So...
What turns a man of the cloth into an archeologist?
translation.fr: Comment un homme de foidevient archéologue ?

translation.en: I don't know, I suppose I--
I wanted to work with something real, something I could touch with my hands.
translation.fr: Je voulais du concret,travailler de mes mains.

translation.en: Do you miss it? Being a priest?
No. There's no point in that.
Sometimes I think the best view of God is from hell.
translation.fr: C'est de l'enferqu'on a la meilleure vue sur Dieu.

translation.en: I should get to bed.
I'm going to Nairobi tomorrow, to see Bession.
translation.fr: Demain, j'irai voir Bession à Nairobi.

translation.en: Talk to Father Gionetti. Gionetti?
He runs the sanitarium.
Well, thank you... for the medical care.
[WHISPERING] And deliver us from evil.
for thine is the kingdom and the power and the glory, forever and ever....
translation.fr: Car à toi appartiennent le règne,la puissance et la gloire, à jamais.

translation.en: You, priest, what is your name?
translation.fr: Vous, le prêtre. Quel est votre nom ?

translation.en: I'm Father Merrin.
God is not here today, priest.
Want some water?
Hey. What's wrong?
It's late. You should go back to bed.
Give it to me! It's mine!
Oh, is it yours? Give it to me!
Mr. Merrin gave it to me.
Here, take it. Take it! Oh, just give it to me, you idiot!
Who are you calling idiot? Take it, it's right here!
translation.fr: Qui tu traites de crétin ? Attrape-la !

translation.en: Give it to me! It's mine! Shorty, shorty!
Just give it to me! All right, okay!
Go back to bed, and I'll give you the stupid thing.
translation.fr: Retourne te coucher et je te la donne.

translation.en: Joseph, look out!
Joseph, get Papa, get Papa!
Joseph, help me!
Joseph, please, get Papa quickly!
translation.fr: S'il te plaît, va chercher papa !

translation.en: JAMES: Help me! Help me!
JAMES: Help me! Papa, help me, please!
SARAH: What happened? Hyenas. They tore James apart.
translation.fr: - Que s'est-il passé ?- James a été dévoré par les hyènes.

translation.en: Did you see that, Lankester? The hyenas ignored Joseph.
translation.fr: Vous avez vu ?Les hyènes ont ignoré Joseph.

translation.en: They were focused on his brother. That was a lot more than focused.
translation.fr: - Elles se concentraient sur James.- Plus que ça.

translation.en: They acted as if he wasn't even there.
translation.fr: Elles ont fait comme s'il n'était pas là.

translation.en: Can you see? Can you hear?
You worked on a dig in Derati.
translation.fr: Vous étiez sur le site de Derati.

translation.en: You drew a picture of an idol.
Where did you see it? Was it in the church?
Father Merrin. How do you know my name?
translation.fr: - Père Merrin.- Vous connaissez mon nom ?

translation.en: I said, how do you know my name?
Are you hurt?
I'm free.
God is not here today, priest.
I hope he finds peace.
I'm Father Gionetti.
I've been waiting for you.
MERRIN: How did he know my name?
Have you drifted so far from God, Merrin, that you can't see?
translation.fr: Êtes-vous éloigné de Dieu à ce pointpour ne pas voir ?

translation.en: Monsieur Bession was touched by the devil.
translation.fr: Bession avait été touché par le diable.

translation.en: Demonic possession? Forgive me, Father.
translation.fr: Une possession ? Je n'y crois guère.

translation.en: I never said he was possessed. Only touched.
So, touched. What does that mean?
In 1647, the Ursuline Convent in Loudun, France
translation.fr: En 1647, le couvent des Ursulinesde Loudun, en France,

translation.en: was plagued by possession.
translation.fr: a été frappé par la possession.

translation.en: Thirty-four nuns had been touched by the devil, committing unspeakable acts.
translation.fr: 34 sœurs touchées par Satancommettant des actes indicibles.

translation.en: Having orgies including goats
doesn't make them possessed, simply horny...
and inventive.
Four priests were dispatched to exorcise the demons.
translation.fr: Quatre prêtres furent envoyéspour exorciser les démons.

translation.en: Three of them were possessed themselves and subsequently died.
translation.fr: Trois d'entre eux furent possédéset périrent ensuite.

translation.en: The last one was driven insane by his brush...
translation.fr: Le dernier sombra dans la folieaprès cet affrontement

translation.en: with evil.
That is what happened to Monsieur Bession.
translation.fr: Il est arrivé la même chose à Bession.

translation.en: And that evil remains in Derati.
translation.fr: Et le mal demeure toujours à Derati.

translation.en: You must be careful there.
Remember, he is the father of lies.
translation.fr: Il est le père des mensonges,n'oubliez pas.

translation.en: He will seek to poison your mind.
You will need this against him.
The Roman Rituals.
If you need somebody to perform an exorcism, I'm not your man.
translation.fr: S'il s'agit d'exorcisme,je ne suis pas celui qu'il vous faut.

translation.en: I'm not a priest anymore.
You will always be a priest, Father Merrin.
translation.fr: Vous serez toujours prêtre, Père Merrin.

translation.en: Only your faith can save you.
translation.fr: Seule votre foi peut vous sauver.

translation.en: Well, then, I'm doomed.
translation.fr: Dans ce cas, je suis perdu.

translation.en: What do you have there?
Can I see?
You threw it away.
Jefferies, what the hell are you doing in here?
translation.fr: - Que faites-vous ici ?- C'était par terre, dehors.

translation.en: It was in the dirt outside, you threw it away.
translation.fr: - Que faites-vous ici ?- C'était par terre, dehors. Vous l'avez jetée.

translation.en: No, I didn't.
The clasp must have come loose. Liar!
translation.fr: - Elle a dû se détacher.- Menteuse !

translation.en: Do I repulse you that much?
translation.fr: Je vous répugne à ce point ?

translation.en: Maybe if you could cure my fucking face,
translation.fr: Si vous étiez foutuede guérir ma tronche,

translation.en: I might look as good to you as that archeologist.
translation.fr: je serais aussi jolique votre archéologue.

translation.en: [WHISPERS] He's coming for you.
What?
[NORMAL VOICE] He's coming for you.
What happened? I had a bad dream.
translation.fr: - Que s'est-il passé ?- J'ai fait un cauchemar.

translation.en: Don't worry.
You'll be fine.
Where is everybody?
Sebituana's baby is coming, so the village has gathered in welcome.
translation.fr: L'enfant de Sebituana va naître.Le village s'est réuni.

translation.en: You're back.
Are you all right? Yeah, I'm just a little bit tired.
translation.fr: - Ça va ?- Je suis un peu fatiguée, c'est tout.

translation.en: These lesions...
they're not from the shock, are they?
translation.fr: Elles ne viennent pas du choc.

translation.en: No. They're completely asymptomatic. It just doesn't make sense.
translation.fr: Elles sont asymptomatiques.Je n'y comprends rien.

translation.en: He should have recovered by now. So, what is it?
translation.fr: - Il aurait déjà dû guérir.- Qu'est-ce que c'est ?

translation.en: In this part of the world...
it could be a dozen things.
translation.fr: ça peut être bien des choses.

translation.en: But his symptoms don't really match any of them.
translation.fr: Mais ses symptômesne correspondent à rien.

translation.en: So all I can do is just watch and wait.
translation.fr: Je ne peux qu'observer et attendre.

translation.en: I have to do some work up at the dig.
translation.fr: J'ai du travail, sur le chantier.

translation.en: Will you be all right?
Come sit with me, Lankester.
I promise I won't bite.
What is it?
How was Nairobi? Oh, fine.
Did you see Monsieur Bession? He's dead.
translation.fr: - Vous avez vu M. Bession ?- Il est mort.

translation.en: How? I don't know.
Some accident.
I just don't understand.
Everything that's happening here...
translation.fr: Tout ce qui se passe ici…

translation.en: It seems like I can't help anyone anymore.
translation.fr: Je n'arrive plus à aider personne.

translation.en: Easy.
Help me hold him.
I'm doing everything I can for him.
translation.fr: Je fais le maximum pour lui.

translation.en: It's this place, Lankester. The Turkana are right, it's cursed.
translation.fr: Les Turkana ont raison.Cet endroit est maudit.

translation.en: Sarah. You don't understand.
What they did to me in the camp. They--
translation.fr: Ce qu'ils m'ont fait, dans le camp…

translation.en: There's nothing left to bleed.
translation.fr: Il n'y a plus rien à faire saigner.

translation.en: There is something here, something evil.
translation.fr: Il y a quelque chose de maléfique, ici.

translation.en: Sarah, it's so much easier to believe
translation.fr: C'est tellement plus simplede croire que le mal est une entité.

translation.en: in evil as an entity, but it's not.
translation.fr: C'est tellement plus simplede croire que le mal est une entité. Mais non.

translation.en: It's a purely human condition inside all of us.
translation.fr: C'est une pulsion humaine et universelle.

translation.en: Did Bession talk about what he found under the church?
translation.fr: Bession a parléde ce qu'il a trouvé sous l'église ?

translation.en: There's an ancient temple below, a pagan place,
translation.fr: Il s'agit d'un temple ancien où les païens

translation.en: where they used to conduct sacrifices, human sacrifices.
Why would they build a church on top of something like that?
translation.fr: Pourquoi bâtir une églisepar-dessus un tel lieu ?

translation.en: Perhaps to purify the site.
But then, why bury it?
You better come with me.
Jefferies didn't show up for the dig this morning.
translation.fr: Jefferies ne s'est pas présenté, ce matin.

translation.en: He wasn't in his room, so they came to the bar, and they found...
translation.fr: Il n'était pas dans sa chambre.En le cherchant au bar, ils ont vu…

translation.en: Chief Sebituana's baby was stillborn last night.
translation.fr: Le bébé de Sebituana est mort-né.

translation.en: He blames the whites.
You think the Turkana took Jefferies?
I think this place is on the verge of an uprising.
translation.fr: On est au bord du soulèvement.

translation.en: I've contacted Major Granville. A detachment will be here by this afternoon.
translation.fr: J'ai contacté le major Granville.Un détachement arrive cet après-midi.

translation.en: You disagree?
In my experience, bringing soldiers into a situation is always a bad idea.
translation.fr: C'est une erreur d'envoyer l'arméedans ce genre de situations.

translation.en: MERRIN: Who buried them?
Everybody died.
Who buried them?
MAN: All right.
Out!
Major Granville. Hello, Peter.
MAN: Come on. Out you get. Move it, Wilkins.
Any answers on Jefferies? I'm afraid not.
Well, you did the right thing calling me, Father.
translation.fr: Vous avez bien fait de m'appeler.

translation.en: I've been in these situations before, and you have to stay on top of--
translation.fr: J'ai déjà connu ce genre de situation.Il faut maintenir la domination…

translation.en: On top of these people.
I'm not sure the Turkana are responsible for what's happening here, Major.
translation.fr: Je ne pense pasles Turkana responsables.

translation.en: Major Granville?
This dig is too important to jeopardize,
translation.fr: Ces fouilles ne doivent pasêtre compromises.

translation.en: and until I'm satisfied that the excavation is secure,
translation.fr: Ces fouilles ne doivent pasêtre compromises. L'armée anglaise en prend le contrôletant que le site n'est pas sûr.

translation.en: the British army will assume complete control.
translation.fr: L'armée anglaise en prend le contrôletant que le site n'est pas sûr.

translation.en: The Turkana won't like the show of force. I'm not concerned with what the Turkana like, Mr. Merrin.
translation.fr: - Ça ne plaira pas aux Turkana.- Je m'en fiche.

translation.en: And if they start any more trouble,
they will have to answer to the might of His Majesty King George.
translation.fr: ils en répondront devant les forcesde Sa Majesté le roi George.

translation.en: You cannot be here.
Please tell Sebituana I'm sorry for his loss.
You are not welcome here.
I want to know about the plague that destroyed this village 50 years ago.
translation.fr: J'ai des questions sur la pestequi a détruit le village il y a 50 ans.

translation.en: It was not a plague.
So, what was it?
The evil in your church, it has taken Emekwi's youngest son...
translation.fr: Le mal de ton églisea pris le fils d'Emekwi.

translation.en: and it is getting stronger.
translation.fr: Il est de plus en plus fort.

translation.en: You must abandon your work... or we'll be forced to stop you.
translation.fr: Renonce à tes recherchesou nous devrons t'arrêter.

translation.en: So you don't want to tell me?
translation.fr: Vous ne voulez pas me dire ?

translation.en: He says he doesn't have to tell you, because it's happening again...
translation.fr: Il dit que ce n'est pas nécessaire,car c'est en train d'arriver.

translation.en: right now.
You don't bury your dead. You cremate them.
translation.fr: Vous n'enterrez pas vos morts.Vous les brûlez.

translation.en: Then who's buried in that graveyard?
translation.fr: Alors, qui repose dans le cimetière ?

translation.en: I'm sorry.
What are you--?
I'm sorry.
Daddy.
I will shoot 10, priest...
and you will choose.
I can't do that.
Now you choose...
or I will kill them all.
Are you praying?
To God?
Shoot me.
God is not here today, priest.
[CRYING] Papa.
They're empty. What?
I dug up three graves. They were all empty.
I don't know. Oh, yes, you do.
You've been lying to me since we got here.
translation.fr: - Vous mentez depuis le départ.- Lâchez-moi.

translation.en: Let go of me. Damn it!
translation.fr: - Vous mentez depuis le départ.- Lâchez-moi. Il y a des croix sur ces tombes !

translation.en: There are crosses on the graves.
translation.fr: Il y a des croix sur ces tombes !

translation.en: There are crosses on the coffins.
The church buried them, didn't they?
translation.fr: L'église les a enterrés. C'est ça ?

translation.en: Didn't they?
Why?
What were they hiding?
That this place is damned. [SCOFFS]
No! You asked the question! Now you're gonna listen to the answer!
translation.fr: Vous vouliez savoir, vous allez écouter !

translation.en: There was a massacre here...
translation.fr: Un massacre a eu lieu ici,

translation.en: 1500 years ago.
An army from the West, led by two priests,
translation.fr: Une armée venue de l'ouest,menée par deux prêtres,

translation.en: searching for the origin of a powerful evil.
But when they got here, that evil consumed them,
translation.fr: Arrivés ici,ils ont été consumés par ce mal

translation.en: turning the soldiers against each other in a bloodbath.
translation.fr: et ils se sont tous entretués.

translation.en: Only a single priest survived. When that priest made it back to the Emperor Justinian,
translation.fr: Un seul prêtre a survécu. Il est retournéauprès de l'empereur Justinien,

translation.en: he ordered that a church be built over the site and then buried to seal the evil inside.
translation.fr: qui a ordonné qu'on érige une égliseet qu'on l'enfouisse pour contenir le mal.

translation.en: All mention of it was to be stricken from the history texts forever.
translation.fr: Aucun texte ne devait jamaisévoquer son existence.

translation.en: But it wasn't.
a Vatican researcher found an ancient letter in the archives.
translation.fr: un archiviste du Vaticana trouvé une missive antique.

translation.en: Four priests came to examine the site,
translation.fr: Quatre prêtres sont venus examiner le site

translation.en: enlisting the help of the people of this valley in their search,
translation.fr: et ont enrôlé les habitants de la vallée.

translation.en: and they all disappeared.
Where did they go?
No one knows.
The Vatican ordered a cover-up...
translation.fr: Le Vatican a ordonnéqu'on étouffe l'affaire.

translation.en: the false graveyard.
The tale of a plague to....
To scare people away.
And then the British stumbled across it.
translation.fr: Mais les Anglais sont tombés dessus.

translation.en: And I was sent here to see if the legend was real.
translation.fr: On m'envoie vérifiersi la légende dit vrai.

translation.en: What legend?
That after the war in heaven...
translation.fr: Celle qui dit qu'aprèsla guerre céleste…

translation.en: this is the spot where Lucifer fell.
translation.fr: c'est ici que Lucifer est tombé.

translation.en: God brought you here, Lankester.
Leave me alone.
The devil is here...
inside that boy.
The Turkana know it.
They came to drive the devil from him, and he almost killed them.
translation.fr: Ils sont venus chasser le diableet il a failli les tuer.

translation.en: You can't run from this.
You must help me.
I can't.
But you've seen what's going on here.
translation.fr: Vous avez vu ce qui se passe.

translation.en: You have to believe.
I believe in nothing.
They've found Jefferies.
Major Granville. Wait.
Get him down.
You all right, Major?
Savages.
Major.
Bloody savages. JOMO: Why are you here?
Granville! JOMO: You have no business to be here!
translation.fr: - Granville !- Vous n'avez rien à faire ici !

translation.en: JOMO: You must leave. Granville!
JOMO: You people have plundered our ancestors.
You must return Turkana to us now. MERRIN: Let me through!
JOMO: It's time to go. You have already polluted our lives.
translation.fr: Il faut partir. Vous avez pollué nos vies.

translation.en: You came here with your evil.
We knew peace before you came.
translation.fr: - Avant vous, on était en paix.- Granville !

translation.en: CHUMA: They think it's inside Joseph. They believe the evil is upon us.
translation.fr: Ils pensent qu'il habite Joseph.Ils pensent que le mal nous menace.

translation.en: They believe it is inside Joseph. They're going to kill him.
translation.fr: Ils pensent que Joseph est possédé.Ils vont le tuer.

translation.en: Now, please...
go.
Sir, the Turkana are preparing to attack.
Leave me.
Sir?
I said, leave me.
Yes, sir.
We must leave now. Why?
Where's Sarah? I don't know.
translation.fr: - Où est Sarah ?- Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: Take the boy to Nairobi.
Father Gionetti.
FRANCIS: Why?
Turkana are coming to kill him.
It's a sandstorm.
It won't let us leave.
We have to hide him.
The church. No.
The Turkana won't go in there. It's his only chance.
translation.fr: Les Turkana n'y entrent pas,c'est sa seule chance.

translation.en: Aren't you coming? I have to find Sarah.
translation.fr: - Vous ne venez pas ?- Je cherche Sarah.

translation.en: We'll meet you.
Now go.
[WHISPERS] The Lord is coming for you.
Bession was Sarah's husband?
translation.fr: Bession était le mari de Sarah ?

translation.en: She went into the church with him, didn't she?
translation.fr: Elle est entrée dans l'église avec lui ?

translation.en: It's not Joseph.
It's Sarah.
Ready yourselves, men!
MAN: Fire!
O, Lord, forgive my disbelief.
translation.fr: Ô, Seigneur,pardonne mon manque de foi.

translation.en: I need you.
These people need you. This valley needs you.
translation.fr: Ces gens ont besoin de Toi.La vallée a besoin de Toi.

translation.en: Hear my cry.
Do not abandon me now.
Forgive my sins.
[DEMONIC VOICE] Come sit with us, Lankester.
I promise I won't bite.
Joseph, run.
He's mine.
Run.
Leave him alone.
It's me you want.
I am a fallen priest.
Lord, have mercy on us.
Christ, have mercy on us. Lord, have mercy on us.
translation.fr: Jésus-Christ, aie pitié de nous.Seigneur, aie pitié de nous.

translation.en: God, Father in heaven, have mercy on us.
translation.fr: Dieu, le Père aux cieux,aie pitié de nous.

translation.en: God, the Son, redeemer of the world, have mercy on us.
translation.fr: Dieu, le Fils, sauveur du monde,aie pitié de nous.

translation.en: God, the Holy Spirit, have mercy on us.
translation.fr: Dieu, le Saint-Esprit, aie pitié de nous.

translation.en: Christ, hear us.
Holy Mary, pray for us.
Christ, hear us.
Lord, have mercy on us.
What's the matter, Merrin?
Don't you wanna fuck me anymore?
translation.fr: Tu ne veux plus me baiser ?

translation.en: All ye holy angels and archangels, pray for us!
translation.fr: Horde des anges et archanges saints,priez pour nous !

translation.en: All ye holy orders of blessed spirits, [LAUGHS] pray for us!
translation.fr: Ordres sacrés des esprits pieux,priez pour nous.

translation.en: Why would he listen to you?
You.
You believe in nothing.
You're all alone.
Without hope.
Almighty Lord and father of Jesus Christ...
grant me, your unworthy servant, pardon for my sins...
translation.fr: accorde-moi le pardon,à moi, l'indigne pécheur.

translation.en: and the power to fight this cruel--
Joseph, come on.
Don't be afraid. No! Father!
MERRIN: Joseph. JOSEPH: Father Merrin....
Help me.
Oh, Lord...
by your name, save me.
By your strength, defend my cause.
translation.fr: Par Ta force, défends ma cause.

translation.en: Joseph, wait.
Joseph. JOSEPH [ECHOING]: Father.
I'm coming.
O, God, hear my prayer.
The ruthless seek my life. They do not keep God before them.
translation.fr: Le vil veut ma mort.Lui qui vit hors de la crainte de Dieu.

translation.en: Turn back the evil upon my foes.
In your faithfulness, destroy them.
Where is your God now, Merrin?
Fucking his only son while you call out his name?
translation.fr: Il enfile son filspendant que tu l'appelles ?

translation.en: He doesn't care about this whore. But you do...
translation.fr: Il se fout de cette pute. Mais pas toi.

translation.en: because you want to shove your rotten cock up her juicy ass.
translation.fr: Tu veux foutre ta vieille queuedans son cul bien serré !

translation.en: You can't have her, priest. The whore is mine.
translation.fr: Tu ne l'auras pas. Elle est à moi.

translation.en: And I'll kill her before I let you take her from me.
translation.fr: Je la tuerai plutôt que de te la laisser.

translation.en: For the soul's made to the image and likeness of God...
translation.fr: De l'âme modelée à l'image de Dieu,

translation.en: I cast you out!
You're a killer, Merrin.
You looked them in the eye, pointed, and they died.
translation.fr: Tu les as regardés, désignés,puis ils sont morts.

translation.en: [GERMAN OFFICER'S VOICE] God is not here today, priest.
Oh, yes, he is.
You're going to watch him die, Merrin Fail him like you failed all the others.
translation.fr: Tu vas le regarder mourir.Comme tu as laissé mourir les autres.

translation.en: God, spare this child, for he is innocent...
translation.fr: Seigneur, épargne cet enfantcar il est innocent

translation.en: and deserves your blessing. God, spare this child...
translation.fr: et mérite Ta bénédiction.Seigneur, épargne cet enfant

translation.en: for he is innocent and deserves your blessing.
translation.fr: car il est innocentet mérite Ta bénédiction.

translation.en: God, spare this child, for he is innocent and deserves your blessing.
translation.fr: Épargne cet enfant car il est innocentet mérite Ta bénédiction.

translation.en: I command you to depart! It's the power of Christ that compels you!
translation.fr: Je t'ordonne de t'en aller !Au nom du Christ, obéis !

translation.en: It is God himself who commands you. It is the majestic Christ who commands you.
translation.fr: Dieu te l'ordonne. Le Christ te l'ordonne.

translation.en: God, the Father, commands you. God, the Son, commands you.
translation.fr: Dieu, le Père te l'ordonne.Dieu, le Fils te l'ordonne.

translation.en: God, the Holy Spirit commands you. The mystery of the cross commands you.
translation.fr: Le Saint-Esprit te l'ordonne.La croix te l'ordonne.

translation.en: Unclean spirit, I cast you out!
It's over now.
Father.
Don't be afraid. I need your help, Joseph.
translation.fr: N'aie pas peur. J'ai besoin de ton aide.

translation.en: Listen, whatever you hear, whatever you see, it's just his lies.
translation.fr: Quoi que tu entendes, que tu voies,ce ne sont que des mensonges.

translation.en: Don't listen. Don't watch. You understand?
translation.fr: N'écoute pas, ne regarde pas. Compris ?

translation.en: Don't listen!
It's just lies. You have to be strong and concentrate.
translation.fr: Ce sont des mensonges.Sois fort, concentre-toi.

translation.en: Can you read this?
I will start there. Then you will answer.
That's me. That's you. That's me, and that's you. You understand?
translation.fr: Moi, je dis ça. Toi, ça. Tu as compris ?

translation.en: Good.
Let's start.
O, God, by your name, save me.
translation.fr: Ô, Dieu, par Ton nom, sauve-moi.

translation.en: Save your servant.
JOSEPH: "Who places his trust in thee, my God."
translation.fr: "Qui place sa confiance en Toi, Seigneur."

translation.en: Be unto her, O, Lord, a fortified tower.
translation.fr: Sois pour elle, Seigneur, un bastion.

translation.en: JOSEPH: "In the face of the enemy."
O, Lord, hear my prayer.
"And let my cry come unto thee."
The Lord be with you. "And also with you."
translation.fr: - Que le Seigneur soit avec toi.- "Et avec toi."

translation.en: Be gone, evil spirit...
In the name of the Father and of the Son...
translation.fr: au nom du Père, et du Fils,

translation.en: and of the Holy Ghost.
By the sign of this Holy Cross...
by our Lord Jesus Christ...
God, the Holy Ghost, commands you!
The blood of the martyrs commands you!
translation.fr: Le sang des martyrs te l'ordonne !

translation.en: In God's name, demon!
I cast you out!
Okay?
[NORMAL VOICE] Thank you.
Sarah. What is it?
What is it, Sarah?
Help. Help!
Help.
No. Help.
[WHISPERS] Father.
She's with God now.
translation.fr: Elle est auprès de Dieu, maintenant.

translation.en: She's with God.
I trust your mission was successful.
I couldn't find what you were looking for.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas trouvé ce que vous cherchiez.

translation.en: But you found something.
translation.fr: Mais vous avez trouvé quelque chose.

translation.en: Didn't you?
Goodbye, Mr. Semelier.
Au revoir , Mr. Merrin.
It's Father Merrin.
